title: Line object
description: Template container for Line, still to be populated

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

BookingStatus.title: Booking Status
BookingStatus.description: A value that determines whether the line is booked and is capable of delivering ads. For a states , see Booking Status Values.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: User notes related to this line.

Cost.title: Cost
Cost.description: The projected cost of the line is based on the specified targeting.

EndDate.title: End Date
EndDate.description: The date and time that the line will stop.

Name.title: Line Name
Name.description: The line's display name. The name must be unique.

OrderId.title: Order ID
OrderId.description: The ID of the order that this line belongs to.

ProductId.title: Product ID
ProductId.description: The ID of the product where the creatives run.

ProviderData.title: Provider Data
ProviderData.description: An opaque CLOB of provider-defined data.

OOHProviderData.description: The OOHProviderData object is used for Buyers to detail structured information

ReservedExpiryDate.title: Reserved Expiry Date
ReservedExpiryDate.description: The date and time that the reserved inventory will expire. If the line is reserved, the expiry date must be set.

StartDate.title: Start Date
StartDate.description: The date and time that the line will start.

StateChangeReason.title: State Change Reason
StateChangeReason.description: The reason why the state was changed by the publisher. The reason must be specified if: The publisher declined the booking or reservation, The publisher or user canceled the flight.

Availability.title: Array of ProductAvails
Availability.description: This Object is used to return the latest Product Avails in the event of the line reserve or booking request failing because of a change in product availability between booking states
